actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a National Organ and Tissue Donor Registry Resource Center, to authorize grants for State organ and tissue donor registries, and for other purposes.
short_title: Everson Walls and Ron Springs Gift for Life Act of 2014

titles.title: Everson Walls and Ron Springs Gift for Life Act of 2014

To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a National Organ and Tissue Donor Registry Resource Center, to authorize grants for State organ and tissue donor registries, and for other purposes.
